description: Creates a core network as part of your global network, and optionally, with a core network policy.

parameters.name: GlobalNetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the global network that a core network will be a part of.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Key-value tags associated with a core network request. (dict) --- Describes a tag. Key (string) --- The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters. Value (string) --- The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Constraints: Maximum length of 128 characters.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The tag value. Constraints: Maximum length of 256 characters.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token associated with a core network request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: CoreNetwork
nested_items.description: Returns details about a core network.

nested_items.name: GlobalNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of the global network that your core network is a part of.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkId
nested_items.description: The ID of a core network.

nested_items.name: CoreNetworkArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of a core network.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of a core network.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when a core network was created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of a core network.

nested_items.name: Segments
nested_items.description: The segments within a core network.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of a core network segment.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocations
nested_items.description: The Regions where the edges are located.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SharedSegments
nested_items.description: The shared segments of a core network.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NetworkFunctionGroups
nested_items.description: The network function groups associated with a core network.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the network function group.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocations
nested_items.description: The core network edge locations.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SendVia
nested_items.description: The list of segments associated with the send-via action.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SendTo
nested_items.description: The list of segments associated with the send-to action.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Edges
nested_items.description: The edges within a core network.

nested_items.name: EdgeLocation
nested_items.description: The Region where a core network edge is located.

nested_items.name: Asn
nested_items.description: The ASN of a core network edge.

nested_items.name: InsideCidrBlocks
nested_items.description: The inside IP addresses used for core network edges.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The list of key-value tags associated with a core network.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The tag value.
